summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Schooltino new features - Voice Assistant, SMS Center, Image Gallery, Website Integration, QR Code, and Report Cards. All 16 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend pages load correctly with proper UI elements.
passed_tests: Backend: Director login authentication
Backend: SMS templates endpoint - returns 4 templates (Fee Reminder, Attendance Alert, Exam Notice, Result Declared)
Backend: SMS send to all parents (MOCKED - ready for Twilio integration)
Backend: SMS send to individual number (MOCKED)
Backend: Voice command API - 'dashboard dikhao' processed by GPT-4o
Backend: Voice command API - 'students ki list dikhao' processed
Backend: Voice command API - 'fee reminder bhejo sabko' processed
Backend: Image list endpoint
Backend: Image upload endpoint - successfully uploads PNG images
Backend: Image delete endpoint
Backend: QR code generation for student - returns valid base64 QR code
Backend: Report card generation - calculates percentage and grade
Backend: Website config get endpoint
Backend: Website configure endpoint - generates API key and embed code
Backend: Public school info API
Backend: Public notices API
Frontend: Voice Assistant page loads with microphone button and Quick Commands
Frontend: SMS Center page loads with All Parents/By Class/Individual options
Frontend: SMS templates displayed (Fee Reminder, Attendance Alert, Exam Notice, Result Declared)
Frontend: Image Gallery page loads with Upload Image button and category tabs
Frontend: Website Integration page loads with sync toggles and Public API Endpoints
Frontend: AI Content Studio has WhatsApp share option
critical_code_review_comments: SMS sending is MOCKED - logs to DB but doesn't actually send. Ready for Twilio/MSG91 integration
Voice Assistant uses GPT-4o via emergentintegrations for processing Hinglish commands
QR Code generation uses qrcode library - generates valid base64 PNG images
Website Integration provides embed code and public APIs for external website sync
Image upload stores files in /app/backend/uploads/images/ directory
seed_data_creation: Test images uploaded with TEST_ prefix during testing

mocked_apis.sms_sending: SMS feature is MOCKED - logs messages to DB but doesn't send actual SMS. Ready for Twilio/MSG91 integration

context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features tested and working: Voice Assistant (GPT-4o powered, Hinglish support), SMS Center (4 templates, MOCKED sending), Image Gallery (upload/delete/list), Website Integration (sync toggles, embed code, public APIs), QR Code (student ID cards), Report Cards (auto-calculate percentage/grade). SMS sending is mocked - ready for production SMS provider integration.
